OpenNotificatie.title: Open Notificaties
OpenNotificatie.description: Open Notificaties is a modern and open source component for routing messages between components, systems and applications.

Taak.title: Taak
Taak.description: Save tasks in the Objects API with Open Notificaties.

ObjectsApi.title: Objects API
ObjectsApi.description: The Objects API aims to easily store various objects and make them available in standardized format.

Besluiten.title: Besluiten API
Besluiten.description: API for storage and disclosure of decisions and associated metadata.

ProductAanvragen.title: Productaanvragen API
ProductAanvragen.description: API for registration and disclosure of products.

HaalCentraalBrp.title: Haal Centraal BRP
HaalCentraalBrp.description: APIs with which your municipality can request basic data directly from the national registrations.

ContactMoment.title: Contactmomenten API
ContactMoment.description: API for storage and disclosure of contact moments and associated metadata.

OpenZaak.title: OpenZaak
OpenZaak.description: OpenZaak is a production-worthy API platform that implements the API standard for case-oriented working (the ZGW APIs).

connectors.title: Connections
connectors.description: On this page you can create, modify or delete connections with external services.

customercases.title: Cases

userManagement.notSupported: When using Keycloak, user management in Valtimo is not supported. Please use user management within Keycloak instead.

searchFields.noneConfigured: No search fields have been configured for this document type.

searchFieldsTooltips.datetimeRange: A date and time range field

searchFieldsOverviewTooltips.title: The title is an optional field that appears as a label for the current search field. When the title is not set, the default value will be the search field key translation (if there is no translation available, the original key value will be displayed).
searchFieldsOverviewTooltips.key: A unique key by which the search field is identified. If the key is not unique, you will not be able to save the search field.
searchFieldsOverviewTooltips.path: A path which leads to the property you want to search on. For searching in the document's JSON schema, follow this example: 'doc:customer.firstName'. For searching in the document properties, follow these examples: 'case:createdBy', or 'case:sequence', or 'case:assigneeFullName'.
searchFieldsOverviewTooltips.dataType: The data type decides what input is shown to the user. For example, for the data type 'Date', a date picker is shown.
searchFieldsOverviewTooltips.fieldType: The field type decides the values the user can input. For the option 'Single', the user can only input a single value. For the option 'Range', the user may input two values, and these values, and all the values in between, are searched for.
searchFieldsOverviewTooltips.matchType: The match type decides how values in the database are matched to the search values. For the match type 'Exact', the value '1' would only be matched to the value '1'. For the match type 'Contains', the value '1' would be matched to the value '1', '123', and all other values containing '1'.
